hopobject.name: Digiboard
hopobject.body:
The main advantage of this solution is the portability, because only the user needs to carry with ligthweight device, no computer or other device. Naturally the user needs a projector to start an amazing modern and unforgetable experience to users.

You need to project, present or browse in an huge screen? No problem, use a small screen and point you device to it! All your audience will see whatever You want
hopobject.shortdesc: The main idea of digital Whiteboard is develop a not expensive solution for interaction, drawing, internet browsing or slides presentation for educational purpouses, using a projector, a common whiteboard or flat surface. The beaglebone black will capture the XY cordinates when a Pen is pressed on Whiteboard and draw in realtime. The application could send drawings to cloud service, Mail or save as an image.
